name: Phyt4LifeRadio
0:
”Alexa, open fight four life radio”
”Alexa, start fight four life radio”
”Alexa, play fight four life radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fight four life radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Phyt4Life, your accessible radio station that plays only the best in music! Phyt4Life Radio! 24-7 Internet radio station bringing you the very best in Golden Oldies, Jazz and New Gospel. With great commentary, start your day with great positive energy with your hosts and DJs, Turtle Dove and Faye Chew. 
 The cost to advertise on terrestrial radio is obnoxiously high and the territory is highly restrictive. Internet radio crosses all boundaries, barriers, races, creeds, and colors and your advertisement can be restricted to a small geographic area, or your music can be played to the world. Want your music to play around the world? Contact us now!We’re here to provide listeners with entertainment throughout the day, as well as the chance for music artists to achieve discovery and success. 

If you’re an artist or music-lover looking for a modern radio station that plays everything from the top hits to classics to underground gems, you’re in the right place. Phyt4Life takes away the difficulties of getting your music out there and discovering great new artists. 

Partner with us today to bring your music career to the next level. We want to help you gain publicity and succeed within the industry, and the best way to do that is to put yourself on the internet, where people can find you. Let us help you grow.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
